overall.description: Return the string representation of an array.

max_line_width.description: Inserts newlines if text is longer than max_line_width. Defaults to numpy.get_printoptions()['linewidth'].

precision.description: Floating point precision. Defaults to numpy.get_printoptions()['precision'].

suppress_small.description: Represent numbers “very close” to zero as zero; default is False. Very close is defined by precision: if the precision is 8, e.g., numbers smaller (in absolute value) than 5e-9 are represented as zero. Defaults to numpy.get_printoptions()['suppress'].

string.description: The string representation of an array.
